text: Brandon Christopher McCartney (born August 17, 1989), known by his stage name Lil B, is an American rapper. Lil B is also known as The BasedGod. ==Selected discography== * Rain in England (2010) * Angels Exodus (2011) * I'm Gay (I'm Happy) (2011) * Choices and Flowers (2012) * Hoop Life (2014) * Black Ken (2017) ==Other websites== * Twitter ==References== Category:1989 births Category:African-American rappers Category:Rappers from California Category:Musicians from Berkeley, California Category:American Internet celebrities Category:Living people
title: Lil B
